::DarkMouse::

She watched KitKat walk off.  She looked at Destructor. "You..You 
want me to go with you to the maximal base? What are you crazy? 
They'll slag you at first sight and turn me into recycling metal."  
She looked at him, thinking he wasn't all that bad looking, despite 
his lack of common sence.  "Give me one good reason to go with you to 
tha Ark?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>    Destructor found this news exciting. He bowed and walked over to 
dark 
> mouse. Come with me. I will need your help. " He turned to Kit 
Kat..."All I 
> request is that drill bit come along as well. We will need his 
digging 
> capabilites to make a strong foundation. And I thank you for 
trusting me. 
> Dont worry the maximals will help. If they want history to survive."
